burlap.oomdp.stochasticgames.agentactions

Class UniversalSGAgentAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.oomdp.stochasticgames.agentactions.SGAgentAction
      • burlap.oomdp.stochasticgames.agentactions.UniversalSGAgentAction

  • public class UniversalSGAgentAction
extends SGAgentAction
    This SGAgentAction definition defines a parameter-less agent action that can be executed in every state. This is a useful action definition for symmetric games.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class burlap.oomdp.stochasticgames.agentactions.SGAgentAction

    • Constructor Detail

      • UniversalSGAgentAction

        public UniversalSGAgentAction(SGDomain d,
                      java.lang.String name)
        Initializes this single action to be for the given domain and with the given name. This action is automatically added to the given domain
        Parameters:
        d - the domain to which this action belongs
        name - the name of this action

    • Method Detail

      • applicableInState

        public boolean applicableInState(State s,
                        GroundedSGAgentAction gsa)
        Description copied from class: SGAgentAction
        Returns true if this action can be applied in the given state by the given agent with the given parameters.
        Specified by:
        applicableInState in class SGAgentAction
        Parameters:
        s - the state in which the action would be executed.
        gsa - a GroundedSGAgentAction containing the agent name and any parameters of the action
        Returns:
        true if this action can be executed; false otherwise.
